metadata.name: The End of a Life
metadata.description: Glitch art depicts the chaotic and abrupt termination of a life, represented through a pixelated and distorted image. The artwork features a fragmented portrait of a human face, with the glitches symbolizing the final moments of a life flashing before one's eyes. The image is created using various digital techniques, such as data corruption, data bending, and pixel sorting, resulting in a disorienting and surreal composition.
